alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Lafayette; St. Landry; St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 9:49AM CDT until April 15 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lafayette Parish in south central Louisiana... Northeastern Acadia Parish in southwestern Louisiana... Northwestern St. Martin Parish in south central Louisiana... Southeastern St. Landry Parish in central Louisiana... * Until 1015 AM CDT. * At 949 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Church Point, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Opelousas, Carencro, Church Point, Krotz Springs, Leonville, Arnaudville, Sunset, Port Barre, Grand Coteau, Cankton, Mire and Atchafalaya National Wildlife Refuge. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 5 and 19. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Acadia; Lafayette; St. Landry; St. Martin
